Tests that connect returns False when the server is not running

test_connect_server_running(mocker)¶

Tests that connect returns true when the server is running

test_handle_send_server_not_running(mocker)¶

Tests handleSend() method with some preset data. This should not send anything to the server as it is not running.

test_handle_send_server_running(mocker, input_val)¶

Tests handleSend() method with some preset data and checks that it matches when read on the server
